blogs.title: Git Delete Remote Branch – How to Remove a Remote Branch in Git
blogs.content:
In this article, I will show you how to delete a remote branch in Git. But firstly, let’s look at how to delete a local branch.

I’ll use Git bash in this article because it makes working with Git easier than any other terminal. But it's okay if you use another terminal. The commands are still the same.
blogs.author: sahil Mistry

blogs.title: Angular
blogs.content:
rom my experience, there are a few best practices that will make it easier to handle errors in Node.js.

You can handle errors in callbacks. There are some serious drawbacks to using callbacks because it creates a nested “callback hell”. It’s notoriously hard to debug and fix errors if you need to look for them in nested functions.

A better way is to use async/await and try-catch statements, or .catch() errors in promises.

Let me show you what I mean.
blogs.author: sahil Mistry
